name: 招生相关查询模板字典
description: 入学通知、录取结果、招生咨询、面试、计划、任务等招生相关表的查询模板

入学通知总数.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM admission_notifications WHERE deleted_at IS NULL

有效入学通知.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM admission_notifications WHERE status = 1 AND deleted_at IS NULL
有效入学通知.description: 查询有效入学通知数量

本月入学通知.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM admission_notifications WHERE YEAR(created_at) = YEAR(NOW()) AND MONTH(created_at) = MONTH(NOW()) AND deleted_at IS NULL
本月入学通知.description: 查询本月发布的入学通知数量

入学通知类型分布.sql: SELECT notification_type, COUNT(*) as count FROM admission_notifications WHERE deleted_at IS NULL GROUP BY notification_type ORDER BY count DESC
入学通知类型分布.description: 统计入学通知类型分布
入学通知类型分布.response: 入学通知类型分布统计完成

录取结果总数.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM admission_results WHERE deleted_at IS NULL
录取结果总数.description: 查询录取结果记录总数
录取结果总数.response: 录取结果记录总数为{count}条

录取结果统计.sql: SELECT result_type, COUNT(*) as count FROM admission_results WHERE deleted_at IS NULL GROUP BY result_type ORDER BY count DESC
录取结果统计.description: 统计录取结果类型分布

录取支付状态.sql: SELECT payment_status, COUNT(*) as count, SUM(tuition_fee) as total_fee FROM admission_results WHERE deleted_at IS NULL GROUP BY payment_status ORDER BY count DESC
录取支付状态.description: 统计录取学费支付状态
录取支付状态.response: 录取支付状态统计完成

本月录取情况.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM admission_results WHERE YEAR(created_at) = YEAR(NOW()) AND MONTH(created_at) = MONTH(NOW()) AND deleted_at IS NULL

招生咨询总数.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM enrollment_consultations WHERE deleted_at IS NULL
招生咨询总数.description: 查询招生咨询记录总数
招生咨询总数.response: 招生咨询记录总数为{count}条

招生咨询意向分布.sql: SELECT intention_level, COUNT(*) as count FROM enrollment_consultations WHERE deleted_at IS NULL GROUP BY intention_level ORDER BY intention_level DESC
招生咨询意向分布.description: 统计招生咨询意向等级分布
招生咨询意向分布.response: 招生咨询意向分布统计完成

招生咨询渠道分析.sql: SELECT source_channel, COUNT(*) as count FROM enrollment_consultations WHERE deleted_at IS NULL GROUP BY source_channel ORDER BY count DESC
招生咨询渠道分析.description: 分析招生咨询来源渠道
招生咨询渠道分析.response: 招生咨询渠道分析完成

本月招生咨询.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM enrollment_consultations WHERE YEAR(created_at) = YEAR(NOW()) AND MONTH(created_at) = MONTH(NOW()) AND deleted_at IS NULL
本月招生咨询.description: 查询本月招生咨询数量

招生咨询跟进状态.sql: SELECT followup_status, COUNT(*) as count FROM enrollment_consultations WHERE deleted_at IS NULL GROUP BY followup_status ORDER BY count DESC
招生咨询跟进状态.description: 统计招生咨询跟进状态
招生咨询跟进状态.response: 招生咨询跟进状态统计完成

招生面试总数.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM enrollment_interviews WHERE deleted_at IS NULL
招生面试总数.description: 查询招生面试记录总数
招生面试总数.response: 招生面试记录总数为{count}条

招生面试状态统计.sql: SELECT status, COUNT(*) as count FROM enrollment_interviews WHERE deleted_at IS NULL GROUP BY status ORDER BY count DESC
招生面试状态统计.description: 统计招生面试状态分布
招生面试状态统计.response: 招生面试状态统计完成

招生面试平均分.sql: SELECT AVG(score) as avg_score, COUNT(*) as total_interviews FROM enrollment_interviews WHERE deleted_at IS NULL AND score IS NOT NULL
招生面试平均分.description: 查询招生面试平均分数
招生面试平均分.response: 招生面试平均分为{avg_score}分，共{total_interviews}场面试

招生计划总数.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM enrollment_plans WHERE deleted_at IS NULL

本年度招生计划.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count, SUM(target_count) as total_target FROM enrollment_plans WHERE year = YEAR(NOW()) AND deleted_at IS NULL
本年度招生计划.response: 本年度招生计划{count}个，目标招生{total_target}人

招生计划状态分布.sql: SELECT status, COUNT(*) as count FROM enrollment_plans WHERE deleted_at IS NULL GROUP BY status ORDER BY count DESC
招生计划状态分布.description: 统计招生计划状态分布
招生计划状态分布.response: 招生计划状态分布统计完成

招生计划目标统计.sql: SELECT SUM(target_count) as total_target, SUM(target_amount) as total_amount, AVG(target_amount) as avg_amount FROM enrollment_plans WHERE deleted_at IS NULL
招生计划目标统计.description: 统计招生计划目标和金额
招生计划目标统计.response: 招生计划目标统计完成

招生任务总数.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM enrollment_tasks WHERE deleted_at IS NULL

招生任务完成情况.sql: SELECT status, COUNT(*) as count, SUM(target_count) as total_target, SUM(actual_count) as total_actual FROM enrollment_tasks WHERE deleted_at IS NULL GROUP BY status ORDER BY count DESC
招生任务完成情况.description: 统计招生任务完成情况
招生任务完成情况.response: 招生任务完成情况统计完成

招生任务类型分布.sql: SELECT task_type, COUNT(*) as count FROM enrollment_tasks WHERE deleted_at IS NULL GROUP BY task_type ORDER BY count DESC
招生任务类型分布.description: 统计招生任务类型分布
招生任务类型分布.response: 招生任务类型分布统计完成

招生任务优先级统计.sql: SELECT priority, COUNT(*) as count FROM enrollment_tasks WHERE deleted_at IS NULL GROUP BY priority ORDER BY priority DESC
招生任务优先级统计.description: 统计招生任务优先级分布
招生任务优先级统计.response: 招生任务优先级统计完成

招生数据概览.sql: SELECT 'notifications' as category, COUNT(*) as count FROM admission_notifications WHERE deleted_at IS NULL UNION ALL SELECT 'results' as category, COUNT(*) as count FROM admission_results WHERE deleted_at IS NULL UNION ALL SELECT 'consultations' as category, COUNT(*) as count FROM enrollment_consultations WHERE deleted_at IS NULL UNION ALL SELECT 'interviews' as category, COUNT(*) as count FROM enrollment_interviews WHERE deleted_at IS NULL UNION ALL SELECT 'plans' as category, COUNT(*) as count FROM enrollment_plans WHERE deleted_at IS NULL UNION ALL SELECT 'tasks' as category, COUNT(*) as count FROM enrollment_tasks WHERE deleted_at IS NULL
招生数据概览.response: 招生数据概览查询完成
